page.title: 13ROCKLEY SANDS
page.content: {Rockley Sands}is a quiet area, excellent for holidays. It is very close to the water and there are many opportunities for water sports. There is a large{caravan site}which caters for summer visitors. Besides the assortment of caravans, there are entertainment facilities and several small shops and restaurants. There is also a leisure park which seems mainly to be used by the children. Just down the road from the caravan site, there is a{Royal Marines}base which covers a large area and is surrounded by fir trees. The houses outside the base are occupied by the families of those who work at the base.
